title: Asian-style pasta salad
ingredients: ['1 (500g) packet pasta of your choice', '170g (6 oz) broccoli florets', '1 red pepper, chopped', '1 small red onion, diced', '85g (3 oz) mangetout', '225ml (8 fl oz) Asian-style dressing (like Briannas Mandarin Dressing)', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '1 tablespoon minced fresh ginger root (optional)', '1 tablespoon minced garlic (optional)', '1 tablespoon sesame oil', '1/2 tablespoon sesame seeds']
